old: なんだ？　うまい話でもあるのか？
column2: What's that? You got a better offer?

old:
オマイと話だと？
ガハハハ、笑わせる！
column2: Talking to me? Gahahahaha, you make me laugh!
I'd love to play, but see ya.

old:
俺サマとトモダチになろうってか？
悪くないな、でも、まあヤメとくよ
column2: You want to become friends with me? Not bad, but well, I'll pass.

old:
オマイ、強いんだろ？
ちょいと、試してやろうか？
column2: You, are you strong? Shall I test you a little?

old: オマイら、まとめてブッ壊すからな
column2: I'll destroy all of you at once!

old:
あ？　目的だと？
楽しみは秘密にする主義でな
column2:
What?　You said you wanted to do this?
I like to keep my pleasures a secret.

old:
暴れたいトキに暴れる
それが人生ってヤツだ
column2:
When you want to go wild, just go wild.
That's what life is all about.

old:
つまんねえな
ここいらにゃ、弱いヤツらしかいねえのか
column2:
Boring.
Are there only weak people around here?

old:
アレを、アレして――こうなる！
グフ、グフフフフフ！
column2:
Doing that, it becomes like this! 
Gufu, gufufufufu!

old: なんだよ――オマイ、なんだよ！
column2: What is it - you, what is it!
